name: The Mayan Menace
description:
The old abandoned temple has fallen to ruin due to the actions of the skeleton king! You must roam around the island to collect stones and the golden idols of lost gods in order to restore the temple to its former glory. You must be careful though, the skeletons will attempt to stop you.

Credits:
-Sander Venema(TriggerState): Art/Programming/Animation
-Dennis Woering(Woewal): Art/Programming/Animation

African Jungle: RoyaltyFreeSounds
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGxvXIDO15m3JgXSIjXIfKQ
